Hero.name: HAMENNI Rayan
Hero.description: Nesnulfuɣ iferdisen umḍanen s tugna d tazmert, yettuḥeggren i tferkiwin n useqdac.

About.phrase1: Ad yessineɣ seg Tmesɣida n Vgayet, ḥemmleɣ aṭas asnefli n iseɣẓanen d tuɣda n tmelellit tawurmant.
About.phrase2: Xedmeɣ d ddeqs n yiframeworks, yerna ɣur-i tazmert ad nḥulfu d ssin i yitechnologies imaynuten s leḥwaq.
About.phrase3: Iswiw-iw d ad snulfuy tifratin timaynutin d timɛullayin i yesɛan lqem n iseqdacen d tkebbwanin.

Skills.title: Tazmert-iw
Skills.phrase: Tatiknulujiyin d ifecka i seqdecɣ ad rnuɣ tifraten igerrzen yerna izmiren ad d-nernun

projects.title: Isenfaɣen-iw
projects.phrase1: Tafrara n yixeddamen-inu n melmi kan, id yedduklen deg ufeṣṣel amellal akked timellit n tneflit.
projects.description1: Asnas Web i usefru n tuzzna i yezmer ad isfeḍ uḍrisen, tiktiyin, ifarisen akked yipalatin.
projects.title2: Asefru n tsusniwin – Taddart n usnimer
projects.description2: Asnas Web i usefru awurman n tsusniwin, i yettmerna ad isɣewer imnayen s tmeddit, ad ibeddu texxamin, ad isefk asekcam n yilmidan akked aḍfaṛ n ikrimen.
projects.description3: Asmel n uskan aḥerfi, fessus, i yimendad Kussor Immobilière, i yesskan imhalin n umeẓlu akked telɣut n unermis.
projects.description4: Asnas Web ameẓyan i yuraren ad yexdem aṛtas n temliliwin, ad d-yessuffuṭ tusqilt tawurmant, askesum afessas, akked tebdart n tmeddit i teskelsen teryaṭ n tneflit. [anida tella]
